Speaker: Joost Schouppe

Language: English

Media: Slides, Video

There are a lot of statistics available about OSM. Most are current state of affairs, most are global or national at best. My project aims to provide statistics about the evolution of the map for every region in the world, from the very start of the project to the present. An early demo is available at www.global.swing.eu/jive
